kpi_info.title: IPPU Iu GTP data volume, e2e
kpi_info.use: This KPI shows the total amount of GTP data volume coming and going to Iu interface. This KPI is relevant only with ATCA hardware.
kpi_info.formula:
sum( IPPU_GTP_BYTES_SENT_UL + IPPU_GTP_BYTES_SENT_DL +
4294967296 Ã— ( IPPU_GTP_BYTES_SENT_UL_OFL + IPPU_GTP_BYTES_SENT_DL_OFL ) )
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1048576
